StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCandidateTelephoneByPersonAndType]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @PersonID int, @Type int ) AS
DECLARE @charType char(1)
IF(@Type = 1) SET @charType = 'C' ELSE SET @charType = 'H'
SELECT -1 AS [ID] ,[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] ,[AREA_CODE] ,[TELEPHONE_NUMBER] ,[TELEPHONE_TYPE] FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[CANDIDATE_TELEPHONE] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = @PersonID AND [TELEPHONE_TYPE] = @charType
